segments.text: This kitchen scene tugs at my heart a bit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so intent on her dish drying, oblivious to everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water overflowing from the sink is just heartbreaking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's ruining the floor and cabinets, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on that teetering stool could tumble any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, it would be such a tragedy in this home.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, reaching for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But this mischief might lead to tears and bumps.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden view outside only makes the indoor risks feel worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the woman would turn around and prevent the accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All this potential for harm in such a simple family space.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a reminder of how quickly things can go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Poor kids, playing dangerously without supervision.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is growing, adding to the sorrow of neglect.
segments.speaker: PAR
